9001.name: Pursuit
9001.effect: Chase after the opponent and inflict double damage if the target switches out.

9002.name: Shadow Claw
9002.effect: Slash the opponent with a claw made from shadow. This move has a 10% critical hit chance.

9003.name: Shadow Sneak
9003.effect: Sneak in the dark and attack the next turn. The user becomes untargetable by all non-Light typed moves during this turn.

9004.name: Phantom Force
9004.effect: Surround the body with a swirl of dark energy then strike at the opponent. This move has 20% chance of lowering the target's Attack stat.

9005.name: Glare
9005.effect: Frighten the target with a scary face to lower the target's Speed stat.

9006.name: Stalk
9006.effect: Stalk the opponent, allowing the next move to have +1 priority and 50% critical hit chance.

9007.name: Provoke
9007.effect: Taunt the opponent, causing the target to only be able to use attack moves for three turns.

9008.name: Taunt
9008.effect: The user draws attention to itself, making all opposing opponents take aim only at the user.

9009.name: Reprise
9009.effect: For the next 3 turns, the target is forced to repeat its last move used.

9010.name: Feint
9010.effect: Attack the opponent and ignore evasion moves such as Dodge or Guard. It also lifts the effects of those moves.

9011.name: Revenge
9011.effect: Wait 1 turn then deal double the damage taken on next turn.
